post:
Hello guys, been a while !

Great news on Kimsufi !  We made a new range of dedicated servers, including 4 new servers + lower prices on all others servers ! 

From 3,99 € HT / month (ie 4,80 € VAT included)

Enjoy theses new dedicated servers at great prices! 

https://www.kimsufi.com/en/servers.xml 

**NB: There are availabilities issues on this new range, don't worry everything will go back in stock asap.**

Details:

- KS-1	Atom D425 - 2GB DDR3 1066 MHz - 500GB SATA	3,99€
- KS-2	Atom N2800 - 4GB DDR3 1066 MHz - 1TB  4,99€
- KS-3	Atom N2800 - 4GB DDR3 1066 MHz - 2TB SATA	7,99€

- KS-5	AMD Opteron 4122 - 16GB DDR3 1333 MHz - 2TB SATA	13,99€
- KS-6	Intel i5-750 - 16GB DDR3 1333 MHz - 2TB SATA	14,99€
- KS-7	Intel i3-2130 - 8GB DDR3 1333 MHz - 2TB SATA	14,99€
- KS-8	Intel i7-920 - 16GB 1333 MHz - 2TB SATA 15,99€
- **KS-9	Intel W3520 - 16GB DDR3 ECC 1333 MHz - 240GB SSD	16,99€ (NEW)**

- **KS-11	Intel W3520 - 16GB DDR3 ECC 1333 MHz - SoftRaid 2x2TB SATA	19,99€ (NEW)**

_and yes.. it's recurrent haha_
